attributes.action: take down and ban internet sites which assist people who have suicidal thoughts..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sites such as "Assisted Suicide Holidays" should be taken down and banned.  I lost my close friend to suicide who had been on this site and printed off a number of documents which assisted in his hour of need.  I have written to Mr Blair, my MP, the Secretary of State to name but a few... help me to take down these sites - please.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " take down and ban internet sites which assist people who have suicidal thoughts."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14973.asp

Prime Minister's Office
